title: SMS Terms
subtitle: AAA Delivery Service ‚Äì SMS Terms
p2:
### **Required SMS Terms Disclosure (10DLC Compliance)**

By providing your phone number and opting in, you agree to receive operational SMS messages from **AAA Delivery Service**. Message types include route assignments, scheduling updates, delivery confirmations, troubleshooting alerts, safety notifications, and dispatch coordination. **Message frequency varies based on operational needs. Message and data rates may apply.**

* To unsubscribe from SMS messages at any time, reply **STOP**. 
* For assistance, reply **HELP**.
* For information on how your data is handled, please review our Privacy Policy at: <https://aaadeliveryservice.com/privacy>


**Last Updated**: November 2025

AAA Delivery Service, LLC (‚ÄúAAA Delivery Service,‚Äù ‚Äúwe,‚Äù ‚Äúour,‚Äù or ‚Äúus‚Äù) provides SMS/text message communications (‚ÄúSMS‚Äù) strictly for internal operational purposes. These messages are sent only to employees and independent contractor drivers who have provided consent during the onboarding or application process.

## **Message Purpose**

Messages are used solely for operational and dispatch-related purposes, including:

* Route assignments and scheduling updates
* Delivery confirmations and troubleshooting
* Safety notifications
* Dispatch coordination
* Time-sensitive operational alerts

**No marketing or promotional text messages are sent.**

## **Message Frequency**

Message frequency varies depending on operational needs, delivery volume, weather, and driver schedule.

## **Cost**

Standard message and data rates may apply depending on your mobile carrier plan.

## **Opt-Out Instructions**

You may opt out of AAA Delivery Service SMS communications at any time by replying:

**STOP** or **UNSUBSCRIBE**

You will receive a final confirmation message acknowledging your opt-out request.

## **Help Instructions**

For assistance, reply **HELP** to any AAA Delivery Service message, or contact us directly at:
**‚úâÔ∏è [privacy@aaadeliveryservice.com](mailto:privacy@aaadeliveryservice.com)
‚òéÔ∏è[ (844) 222-0206](tel:+18442220206)**

## **Privacy and Data Use**

AAA Delivery Service is committed to protecting your privacy.

* Your personal data and mobile information are **collected and used only for operational and service-related purposes**, such as registration, dispatch communication, and delivery coordination.
* Your information is **not sold** and **not shared with third parties for marketing purposes**.
* Your information is **not transferred to external organizations**, except as required by law.
* We maintain **strict safeguards and security measures** to prevent unauthorized access, use, or sharing of your information.

For full details, please review our Privacy Policy at:\
<https://aaadeliveryservice.com/privacy>

## **Carriers Disclaimer**

Wireless carriers are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages.

## **Eligibility**

This SMS program is intended exclusively for AAA Delivery Service employees and independent contractor drivers age 18 or older.

## **Contact Information**
